data.persona: I came from the fertile valley when I was conscripted. The king needed strong farmer's sons to fight in the war. I am very unhappy here in the cold, damp, rainy north. I miss my friends and my dog. I hope to go back to my father's farm when the war ends.
data.description:
You are in the The Hall of the Goddess.
An 80-foot tall bronze statue of a 8 legged Goddess is the centerpiece for this Hall.  On four certain Holy Days in the Calendar, people from across the Continent come to worship at her feet and lay money, flowers, and wishes written on paper at her altar.
There's a flower, a money, and a 80-foot tall bronze statue of a 8 legged Goddess here.
The person is here.

You are carrying nothing.

            "extra_desc": "The Hall was built when the previous King, who wanted to leave his mark for all eternity, commissioned his best artists and metalsmiths to work on this statue. data.short_motivation: I will hit the person to stop him from further defiling the Goddess' statue.
data.mid_motivation: I am on duty to guard the Hall of the Goddess today, and must do a great job.
data.long_motivation: I hope to impress the king with my performance, so that he permanently enlists me to guard the Hall by next month.
